basics.name: Dzmitry Drepin
basics.label: Development Team Lead (Java)
basics.summary: Skilled Java software engineer analyst with experience in agile software development. I have worked on various projects in different  fields from entertainment to insurance. Through my career I have been always focused on product from business as well as technical perspective making sure that development is always adding value to the final customer. I’m analytic, highly organized person, team player, able to work independently as well as in team environment and success with meeting deadlines under pressure. I’m selfmotivated,  flexible mind person with ideas and enthusiasm. Agile methodologies believer. For every moment ready to learn new tools, methodologies and techniques. I am always customer focused, interested in learning new businesses and technologies.

work.name: Helmes AS
work.summary:
• Recruiting, tracking project progress against planned schedule
• Setting up the mission for the team, ensuring team motivation, evaluation.
Responsible for deciding how to approach tasks and develop a plan to
accomplish them.
• Possible risks and their mitigation with stakeholders
• Organising meetings for any sort of clarification
• Discussing requirements with business users, formalising, analyse, review
and clarification them.
• Doing solution research and design. Creating PoCs for stakeholders
review.
• Discussing & sorting issues as incidents, defects and clarifications.
• Final code review. Incorporating best development practices into the
process. Coaching newcomers
• Evaluate team progress & prepare weekly team report
• Preparing demo’s. Actively support the build and deployment process;
• Developing solution with WS integration, micro-services, messaging,
workflow, data and UI customisation, data migration and concurrent data
processing

work.name: Helmes AS
work.summary:
• Conducting TDDs and recruitment interviews,
• Managing training plans (Personal Development plans),
• Organising educational events,
• Mentoring, prepare & carrying out technical performance reviews and
work interviews.
• Analysis of the area-related training (books, articles, conferences) needs
• Managing conflicts. Define & increase motivational factors for Helmes AS
company.
